title: Pet Friendly, Large Private Patio/Balcony, Spa with Sun Deck
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 38', 'OR Text', '38', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath', 'Come home to Village of Santo Domingo Apartments in Las Vegas, NV!', 'Our apartments are home to a fantastic location where endless opportunities for work and play collide.', 'At our apartments, you can choose from our apartments that are complete with everything you need to always feel right at home.', 'Here you’ll find yourself surrounded by an amenity-rich community and beautiful scenery.', 'Our apartments place you in the best destination to embrace Las Vegas living.', 'This prime neighborhood will give you easier commutes and allow you to experience the perfect balance of modern city life and relaxation.', 'Ready to step into your dream apartment?', 'Apply now to Village of Santo Domingo in Las Vegas today.', 'Features:', 'Central Heating and A/C, Roommate Style Floor Plans, Ceiling Fans, Fireplaces, Kitchen Pantry, Spacious 1 & 2 Bedroom Apartment Homes, Garden Bath Tubs, Large Private Patio/Balcony, Built in Shelves, Full Sized Washer & Dryer, Separate Dining Room', 'Community Amenities:', 'Professionally Managed by AMC, Covered Parking, Great Neighborhood, RESERVE YOUR NEW APARTMENT NOW - ASK US A QUESTION, Close to Public Transportation, Conveniently Located Close to Local Dining, Shopping, & Entertainment, Courtyards, Pet Friendly, Swimming Pool, Gated Access, Spa with Sun Deck', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Rent- 40.00', 'Non-Refundable Fee- 400.00', 'Pet friendly, call for details', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'We7jctiG']
